:::Thunder Hammer:::

Thunder Hammer is growing restless from his long journy. He looks around and 
see nothing in the Horizon. He thinks to himself 'Only a couple more days 
then im giving up.'


>From: JP3884@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars-New Recruit
>Date: Sat, 5 Aug 2000 17:05:16 EDT
>
>     Now, in the safety of Trypticon, the spider and the toad spoke in 
>secret.
>She had taken him in through an old docking bay that was used to load and
>unload cargo. It had been empty for as long as anyone could remember. In 
>it,
>was scattered old tables, chairs, and lighting equitment. Transanulas used 
>it
>briefly has a lair, but was discovered and left it. For now it suited her
>purposes.
>     Sitting on an old barrle, with her legs crossed and the bowcaster in 
>her
>lap, Aracnia began the conversation. She was egar for Paralysis to join 
>her,
>as egar as she was to get Quickstrike and Darkmouse to help her.
>     "Now, Paralysis, tell me all about yourself. I need to know you if 
>your
>to be one of my soldiers." She said cooly.
>     The toad and taken a seat on a turned over computer consol. His long 
>legs
>streched out in front of him as he reclined on his elbows. "Well, Im only
>several hours old, but according to the data tracks im a normal predacon
>warrior. I can fight and know my way around a computer system. What else is
>there?"
>     She noted his cockyness. It was annoying, but attractive. She caught
>herself feeling that way about him several times already. "I see. Well, are
>you willing to help me get into power, and unite the two fractions?"
>     "Yes. I'll help you. What have I got to lose?" He croaked.
>     Aracnia smiled. Excellent. Things were going very well. "Your help 
>will
>be rewarded. Now, Im going to introduce you to Darkmouse. Shes a Predacon
>too, but is under the control of Quickstrike. Quickstrike is ready to help
>me, and the rodent will follow him. Im going to leave you with the mouse
>while I go to the bridge to locate this Thunder Hammer person. The more
>people I have on my side, the better."
>     Paralysis nodded and they went to the vault where Darkmouse was being
>held. The toad held his pistol, ready to fire, as Aracnia opened the cell.
>     "Well Darkmouse, hello. I want to introduce you to Paralysis. He will 
>be
>taking you to Quickstrike very soon." She said, handing a ration of food to
>the mouse.
>     "Yes, I look forward to working with such a preety little bot like
>yourself." Paralysis said with a toothy smile.
>     Aracnia shighed and left the two there. She took a lift to the bridge 
>and
>entered. There, on the scanners was Thunder Hammer. Once agian she departed
>from the ship to meet him.
